betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Normally Pure Crystals are grown by dropping the seeds in water and waiting for a long time, you could speed it up with growth accelerators or use this which though expensive, is automatable.

You simply put the seeds in and import the pure crystals.

You can also speed this up with acceleration cards.

Also Pure Nether Quartz isn't required for any recipes, it is just if you want to save on nether quartz.
